definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: He has converted from Buddhism to Catholicism.
sentences.chinese: 他已放弃佛教改信天主教了。

sentences.english: Various variants of Panthers were converted and mounted with "Biwa".
sentences.chinese: 各种变异的黑豹已改信，骑上以“Biwa”。

sentences.english: His commission was to convert the local heathens to Christianity.
sentences.chinese: 他的使命就是使当地的异教徒改信基督教。

sentences.english: In 1988, Dillard converted to Roman Catholicism.
"Seven save us, " he said, quite forgetting his new red god in his shock.
sentences.chinese: 震惊中把他新近改信的红神忘得干干净净了。

sentences.english: These religious men were patronized by local chiefs, who converted to the new religion.
sentences.chinese: 这些宗教人物受到改信新宗教的地方首领的资助。
他真诚地改信了基督教。

sentences.english: Till the conversion of the Jews.
sentences.chinese: 直到犹太人改信别的宗教。

sentences.english: Yahya's family say Belinda converted to Islam and married Yahya.
sentences.chinese: 叶海亚汗的家人说，贝琳达改信伊斯兰教嫁给了亚汗。

sentences.english: After three months of contemplation she converted to Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 经三个月的沉思冥想之后，她改信了佛教。

sentences.english: There were many conversions to Christianity among the ancient Romans.
sentences.chinese: 有许多古罗马人已改信基督教。

sentences.english: This new video tape from Al-Quida invites Americans to convert to Islam.
sentences.chinese: 基地组织的新录像带引诱美国人改信伊斯兰教。
她放弃异教而改信基督教。

sentences.english: Student: Do we know why Constantine converted?
sentences.chinese: 为什么君士坦丁大帝改信基督教？

definition: religious belief/to practice a faith/to be religious
